theDuelist:MillenniumPuzzle.NAME: Millennium Puzzle
theDuelist:MillenniumPuzzle.FLAVOR: It was originally known as the Millennium Pendant, but after being shattered and requiring assembly it came to be known as the Millennium Puzzle.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, trigger an effect depending on your chosen starting deck.
Challenge Mode: #ySummon #b1 [#FF5252]Exploding [#FF5252]Token at the start of combat. #ySummoning is restricted.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yPuzzle #yToken, gain a random amount (0-10) of #yBlock and gain #b1 #yBlur.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yDragon #yToken, and apply #b
#yWeak or #yVulnerable to a random enemy.
At the start of combat, apply #b
#yPoison or #yConstricted to a random enemy.
At the start of next combat, have a #b
% chance to #yChannel a random Orb.
At the start of combat, gain #yToon #yWorld.
At the start of combat, #yChannel a #yLava Orb.
At the start of combat, increase the #yBlock of a random Duelist card in your draw pile by the number of monsters you #ySummoned in the previous combat, and give that card #yExhaust.
extra card.
extra cards.

At the start of combat, sum up the total #yTribute cost of ALL monsters in your draw pile and increase the damage of a random monster in you draw pile by that much for the rest of combat, and give that monster #yExhaust.
At the start of combat, add a random #yToken to your hand.
At the start of combat, gain a random amount (0-5) of #yBlock and gain #b2 #yBlur.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b2 #yPuzzle #yTokens, and add a random combination of #yRandomized copies of #bJinzo, #bTrap Hole and #bUltimate #bOffering to your hand.
At the start of combat, #ySummon a random amount of #yBonanza #yTokens and gain a random #yBuff.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b3 #yBonanza #yTokens and add some random Duelist cards to your draw pile.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yOrb #yToken and #yChannel #b1 of #b3 random Orbs.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #1 #yZombie #yToken and have a chance to choose #b1 of #b3 monster types to #yResummon a random monster from.
At the start of combat, #yIncrement and #ySummon #b1 for each Act.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yExodia #yToken and draw #b2 extra cards. All cards in your starter deck have #ySoulbound.
At the start of combat, #ySummon #b1 #yPuzzle #yToken and gain Gaze of Anubis.
At the start of combat, #ySummon a random amount #b(1-3) of #yPuzzle #yTokens.
At the start of combat, #ySummon a random amount #b(1-3) of #yPuzzle #yTokens.

theDuelist:MillenniumPuzzleShared.NAME: Millennium Puzzle
theDuelist:MillenniumPuzzleShared.FLAVOR: It was originally known as the Millennium Pendant, but after being shattered and requiring assembly it came to be known as the Millennium Puzzle.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, trigger an effect depending on your chosen starting deck.

theDuelist:MillenniumEye.NAME: Millennium Eye
theDuelist:MillenniumEye.FLAVOR: It was created 3,000 years prior with other Millennium Items by Aknadin. After its creation, Aknadin himself put on the Eye, sacrificing his left eye in the process.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #yToon #yWorld.

theDuelist:MillenniumRing.NAME: Millennium Ring
theDuelist:MillenniumRing.FLAVOR: 3,000 years before present day events, the Millennium Ring and the other Millennium Items were forged in Kul Elna by sacrificing 99 souls of the Kul Elna villagers.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yIncrement #b3.

theDuelist:MillenniumKey.NAME: Millennium Key
theDuelist:MillenniumKey.FLAVOR: After it was made, the Millennium Key was given to Solomon Muto's Egyptian incarnate, Shimon, but later it was passed on to Shada.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Your max #ySummons cannot be higher than #b5.

theDuelist:MillenniumRod.NAME: Millennium Rod
theDuelist:MillenniumRod.FLAVOR: Priest Seto had originally owned the Millennium Rod. Along with the other Items, it was used to resurrect Zorc Necrophades.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, add a #yRandomized #ySpell to your hand.

theDuelist:MillenniumScale.NAME: Millennium Scale
theDuelist:MillenniumScale.FLAVOR: Also known as the Scales of Truth, The Scale was originally owned by Karim.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yTribute with matching monster types, NL gain [E]

theDuelist:MillenniumNecklace.NAME: Millennium Necklace
theDuelist:MillenniumNecklace.FLAVOR: The Millennium Necklace was originally owned by an unnamed high priestess under Aknamkanon, later by Isis under Atem, in Ancient Egypt.
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive an extra potion reward after every combat.

theDuelist:MillenniumToken.NAME: Millennium Token
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose any Duelist card to add to your deck. Your Tokens always cost 0.

theDuelist:MillenniumCard.NAME: Millennium Membership Card
theDuelist:MillenniumCard.FLAVOR: Bonus membership offer for my most powerful Pharoah!
DESCRIPTIONS: #yUpgrade a random #yTribute monster in your deck whenever you enter a shop.

theDuelist:MillenniumHammer.NAME: Millennium Hammer
theDuelist:MillenniumHammer.FLAVOR: A hammer which once belonged to Aknamkanon himself.
DESCRIPTIONS: Consume #b1 #yCharge and #yUpgrade a random card in your deck each time you Smith. Starts with #b3 charges. Each time you pickup a #yMillennium #yItem, gain #b2 charges.

theDuelist:MillenniumStone.NAME: Millennium Stone
theDuelist:MillenniumStone.FLAVOR: A curious stone with seemingly limitless power!
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, upgrade as many cards in your deck as you want. Lose #b3 max HP for each upgrade.

theDuelist:MillenniumCoin.NAME: Millennium Coin
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b100 #yGold for each other #yMillennium #yItem you have.

theDuelist:StoneExxod.NAME: Stone of Exxod
theDuelist:StoneExxod.FLAVOR: A fragment of the Forbidden One?
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you shuffle your deck, add a random #yExodia card to your hand.

theDuelist:GiftAnubis.NAME: Gift of Anubis
DESCRIPTIONS: NL Summon #b1 and consume #b1 #yCharge. NL Starts with #b1 #yCharge. NL Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, gain #b2 #yCharges.

theDuelist:ResummonBranch.NAME: Millennium Branch
theDuelist:ResummonBranch.FLAVOR: The branch of a tree from the Ancient Egyptian era.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, #yResummon a random monster you have played this run for every #b2 cards you #yExhausted on the previous turn.

theDuelist:AeroRelic.NAME: Orb of Slifer
theDuelist:AeroRelic.FLAVOR: A strange orb with mysterious power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yAir orbs always #yChannel a random orb.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicA.NAME: Reward Token
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, receive #b1 extra card reward and consume #b1 #yCharge. Starts with #b2 #yCharges. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, gain #b2 #yCharges.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicB.NAME: Reward Token+
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, receive #b2 extra card rewards and consume #b1 #yCharge. Starts with #b2 #yCharges. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, gain #b1 #yCharge.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicC.NAME: Reward Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, receive #b1 extra card reward and consume #b1 #yCharge. Starts with #b5 #yCharges. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, gain #b1 #yCharge.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicD.NAME: Reward Orb+
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, have a #b5% chance to receive #b5 extra card rewards.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicE.NAME: Reward Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, have a #b33% chance to receive #b2 extra card rewards.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicF.NAME: Spellstone
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose any Spell to add to your deck.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicG.NAME: Trickstone
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose any Trap to add to your deck.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicH.NAME: Battlestone
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose any Monster to add to your deck.

theDuelist:InversionRelic.NAME: Inversion Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yInvert, #yEvoke the original Orb twice.

theDuelist:InversionEvokeRelic.NAME: Inversion Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yInvert, repeat the same #yInvert action.

theDuelist:NaturiaRelic.NAME: Nature Orb
theDuelist:NaturiaRelic.FLAVOR: An orb covered with leaves and dirt. How odd.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yNaturia powers deal #b2 damage per #yNaturia monster instead of #b1.

theDuelist:InsectRelic.NAME: Bug Token
theDuelist:InsectRelic.FLAVOR: A dirty token shaped like a beetle.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yPoison from #yTributing an #yInsect or #yPlant, add #b
extra poison. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, have a #b25% chance to further increase this #yPoison buff by #b1.

theDuelist:MachineToken.NAME: Machine Token
theDuelist:MachineToken.FLAVOR: A mechanical token covered with small wires and strange markings. Best not fiddle with it too much.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yExplosive #yTokens deal damage randomly to enemies instead of damaging you.

theDuelist:MachineTokenB.NAME: Machine Orb
theDuelist:MachineTokenB.FLAVOR: A mechanical orb that seems to be ticking?
DESCRIPTIONS: All #yExplosive #yTokens deal extra damage.

theDuelist:DragonRelic.NAME: Dragon Statue
theDuelist:DragonRelic.FLAVOR: A small statue shaped like a dragon.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain #yStrength from #yTributing a #yDragon, gain #b1 extra #yStrength.

theDuelist:SummonAnchor.NAME: Summoning Anchor
theDuelist:SummonAnchor.FLAVOR: A small red and yellow anchor. What a strange color scheme.
DESCRIPTIONS: #ySummon #b1 Token at the start of each combat.

theDuelist:SpellcasterToken.NAME: Spellcaster Token
theDuelist:SpellcasterToken.FLAVOR: A glowing purple token that seems to hold a mysterious power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yChannel an orb #yChannel an additional random orb.

theDuelist:SpellcasterOrb.NAME: Spellcaster Orb
theDuelist:SpellcasterOrb.FLAVOR: A glowing purple orb that seems to hold a mysterious power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yChannel an orb deal #b3 damage to ALL enemies.

theDuelist:AquaRelic.NAME: Aqua Orb
theDuelist:AquaRelic.FLAVOR: A small blue sphere that smells a bit salty.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain #ySummons from #yTributing an #yAqua, gain #b1 extra #ySummon. NL Synergy: #yAqua #yToken
If the player has #yAqua #yToken, #yTributes are also decreased by #b2.

theDuelist:AquaRelicB.NAME: Aqua Token
theDuelist:AquaRelicB.FLAVOR: A small blue token shaped like seashell. It is quite damp.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #yTribute an #yAqua for another, decrease the #yTributes of all monsters in your hand by #y1 for this turn.

theDuelist:NatureRelic.NAME: Nature Token
theDuelist:NatureRelic.FLAVOR: An orb covered with mud and grass. Gross.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you apply at least #b25 #yPoison in combat, drop an extra card reward.

theDuelist:RandomTributeMonsterRelic.NAME: Tribute Statue
theDuelist:RandomTributeMonsterRelic.FLAVOR: A glowing red stone. It holds mysterious power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose #b1 of #b5 random #yTribute monsters to add to your deck. The chosen monster's #yTribute cost is set to #b1.

theDuelist:TributeEggRelic.NAME: Tribute Egg
theDuelist:TributeEggRelic.FLAVOR: A glowing red egg shaped object. It holds mysterious power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a #yTribute monster that costs #b2 or more #yTributes to your deck, reduce its #yTribute cost by #b1.

theDuelist:FiendRelic.NAME: Dark Token
theDuelist:FiendRelic.FLAVOR: A small darkened token. It feels evil.
DESCRIPTIONS: Move an additional card to your hand each time you #yTribute a #yFiend for another #yFiend.

theDuelist:ZombieRelic.NAME: Lava Token
theDuelist:ZombieRelic.FLAVOR: A smoldering, soot covered token. It's very hot!
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yLava orbs deal an additional #b5 damage.

theDuelist:DragonRelicB.NAME: Dragon Pendant
theDuelist:DragonRelicB.FLAVOR: A small necklace with a pendant shaped like a dragon.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every other time you #yTribute a #yDragon for another #yDragon, draw #b1 #yRare card.

theDuelist:UpgradeBuffRelic.NAME: Ultra Stone
theDuelist:UpgradeBuffRelic.FLAVOR: A glowing red orb that seems to pulsate and emit a great power.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yUpgrading Duelist cards will grant extra bonuses.

theDuelist:ShopRelicRarityRelic.NAME: Shop Token
theDuelist:ShopRelicRarityRelic.FLAVOR: A weird looking rug shaped token.
DESCRIPTIONS: You will encounter rarer relics in the shop more often.

theDuelist:PyramidLight.NAME: Pyramid of Light
DESCRIPTIONS: You can upgrade #yCurses and they become Colorless cards.

theDuelist:YugiMirror.NAME: Yugi's Mirror
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, duplicate a random #yTribute card in your deck. The duplicated copy costs #b0.

theDuelist:StoneKulElna.NAME: Stone of Kul Elna
DESCRIPTIONS: Spells cost #b0. Start each combat [#FF5252]Hexxed.

theDuelist:BlessingAknadin.NAME: Blessing of Aknadin
DESCRIPTIONS: All combats have a small chance to drop an additional Common or Uncommon relic.

theDuelist:HasanPendant.NAME: Hasan's Pendant
DESCRIPTIONS: Discarded cards are instead sent to your draw pile.

theDuelist:MarikToken.NAME: Marik's Token
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Trap that costs [E] [E] or less, multiply your #yStrength by the cost of the Trap multiplied by #b-1.

theDuelist:ZombieRelicB.NAME: Zombie Token
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, if your health is full, copy a random card from your #yExhaust pile into your hand.

theDuelist:DragonRelicC.NAME: Dragon Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yTribute a #yDragon for another, have a #b20% chance to gain [E]

theDuelist:ZombieResummonBuffRelic.NAME: Zombie Statue
theDuelist:ZombieResummonBuffRelic.FLAVOR: A small statue shaped like a zombie.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain #yBlock from #yResummoning a #yZombie, gain #b5 extra #yBlock.

theDuelist:HauntedRelic.NAME: Haunted Pendant
theDuelist:HauntedRelic.FLAVOR: A small grey necklace shaped like a ghost. Creepy!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Start each combat #yHaunted.
Chooses a random type of card. For the rest of combat, all cards of this type cost #b0. Whenever you play a card of this type, trigger a random negative effect.

theDuelist:ToonRelic.NAME: Cartoon Statue
DESCRIPTIONS: When you apply #yVulnerable from #yTributing a #yToon, apply #b1 extra #yVulnerable.
